title: SQUARE 238 DPR FACILITY
description: A DPR warehouse, maintenance facility, and parking lot will be repurposed.  The project will include engaging the community in planning and design.
justification: Square 238 is used by DPR as a parking lot and for maintenance and storage purposes.  This location is precisely where DPR has identified a need for an indoor aquatic facility and other recreation needs.  Some have also proposed this site for a municipal parking garage.
